Program Information.School: Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management

Contact Related Information: The Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management can be reached at 416-415-5000, ext. 6297 or by email at construction_degree@georgebrown.ca. Their office is located in room E228 with hours from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. The CCET Industry Liaison Office holds open houses in the autumn and spring for further information, which can be found on their Open House page. For general George Brown College inquiries, contact 416-415-2000 (TTY 1-877-515-5559) or 1-800-265-2002 (long distance).
